attributes.action: immediately reinstate Margaret Haywood and sack the entire board of the nursing and midwifery council for even considering to strike her off the nursing register.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather than sack nurse Haywood, the NMC should be singing her praises for highlighting the shocking state of care in our hospitals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
